alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Hand; Hyde (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 22 at 5:44PM MDT until April 22 at 6:15PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: The National Weather Service in Aberdeen has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Hand County in central South Dakota... Southeastern Hyde County in central South Dakota... North central Buffalo County in central South Dakota... * Until 715 PM CDT. * At 644 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Etbauer Hill, or 12 miles east of Fort Thompson, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Hand, southeastern Hyde and north central Buffalo Counties, including the following locations... northeastern Crow Creek Reservation. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
